architectural_elements.name: Narrow Wooden Beds
architectural_elements.description: Small, creaky beds with thin mattresses and tattered blankets. Some may have rusty springs or mysterious stains.

architectural_elements.name: Low Ceiling with Exposed Beams
architectural_elements.description: Dark, wooden beams covered in cobwebs, cracks, and signs of water damage.

architectural_elements.name: Small Windows
architectural_elements.description: Tiny, grimy windows with iron bars, letting in minimal light. The glass may be cracked or broken.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Floorboards
architectural_elements.description: Worn, uneven floorboards with gaps, stains, and mysterious scratches.

architectural_elements.name: Thin Walls
architectural_elements.description: Plaster walls with peeling paint, cracks, and faint handprints or writings.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wooden Wardrobe
furniture_and_decor.description: A small, rickety wardrobe containing tattered servant uniforms. The door may creak or refuse to stay closed.

furniture_and_decor.name: Washbasin and Pitcher
furniture_and_decor.description: A chipped ceramic basin and pitcher on a small table, filled with murky water.

furniture_and_decor.name: Nightstand
furniture_and_decor.description: A simple wooden table with a half-burned candle, a rusty key, or a worn-out book.

furniture_and_decor.name: Straight-Back Chairs
furniture_and_decor.description: Plain wooden chairs, some broken or stacked haphazardly in a corner.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wall Hooks
furniture_and_decor.description: Iron hooks on the walls for hanging clothes or tools, some with remnants of fabric or rust.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick cobwebs in the corners, on the furniture, and between the ceiling beams.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating in the dim light, visible near the windows or candle flames.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Lights
atmospheric_details.description: A single candle or oil lamp casting flickering, uneven light and long shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Whispers and Murmurs
atmospheric_details.description: Faint voices, the sound of footsteps, or distant sobbing from unseen servants.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Drafts
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden chills, especially near the beds or windows, with visible breath in the air.

interactive_objects.name: Servant's Diary
interactive_objects.description: A small, leather-bound diary hidden under a pillow or in the nightstand, containing clues or disturbing entries.

interactive_objects.name: Rusty Key
interactive_objects.description: A key hidden in a drawer, under the bed, or behind a loose brick, used to unlock another area.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Pocket Watch
interactive_objects.description: A pocket watch left on the nightstand or in the wardrobe, tied to a time-based puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Uniform Patch
interactive_objects.description: A patch or piece of fabric from a servant's uniform, possibly hinting at their fate or identity.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Compartment
interactive_objects.description: A loose floorboard or secret panel in the wall, containing a note, key, or small artifact.

environmental_effects.name: Drafts
environmental_effects.description: Curtains, bedsheets, or papers moving as if pushed by an unseen force.

environmental_effects.name: Fog
environmental_effects.description: A thin layer of mist near the floor, especially around the beds or windows.

environmental_effects.name: Bloodstains or Dirt Marks
environmental_effects.description: Mysterious stains on the floor, walls, or bedsheets, hinting at past struggles.

environmental_effects.name: Falling Dust or Ash
environmental_effects.description: Dust or ash drifting down from the ceiling or shelves, especially when disturbed.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Faint moonlight filtering through the grimy windows, casting long, eerie shadows.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: A single flickering candle on the nightstand or wall sconce, creating a dim, ghostly ambiance.

lighting.name: Oil Lamp Glow
lighting.description: A weak, flickering glow from an oil lamp, barely illuminating the room.
